grade_comment:
Grade: 85

Comment: The student provided a thorough and accurate explanation of how John the Baptist and Jesus were referred to concerning the title 'Rabbi'. They correctly highlighted the distinction in usage of the title between John the Baptist and Jesus, demonstrating an understanding of the respect and authority associated with their teachings. The student effectively contrasted the roles of John the Baptist and Jesus in relation to the title 'Rabbi' based on a Christian worldview. Great job!
